reviews.title: Boring dinner
reviews.text: Food ver ordinary and was poorly presented. Husbands poached fish in foil looked like the kids made it. My soup was not as explained as on menu and when I decided on the dumplings they were really meatballs-disappointing, went somewhere else other nights.

reviews.title: Restaurant with a View
reviews.text: Nearly every table in the restaurant has a view to Castle Neuschwanstein, so day or night, it is a lovely experience. The menu is not extensive, however we enjoyed the authentic German food and some nice wines, both of which we found to be reasonably priced. The staff are attentive and friendly.
Had dinner and lunch at Hotel Muller --- decent German food --outside dining for lunch
reviews.title: OK dinner and lunch spot
A Good Option
reviews.text: Close to both castles

reviews.title: Nice Outdoor Seating
reviews.text: A very nice place for a meal after a long day of touring. In the nice weather, try the dining in the beer garden

reviews.title: Good food and location
reviews.text: My wife and I ate lunch here while we were visting the castles and Hohenschwangau. We had the Bavarian sausage, bratwurst, saurkraut, pretzel, and fries. The food was typical Bavarian and very good if you enjoy that style of food. I had a beer and my wife enjoyed some wine. The food was a bit pricy but that was expected in this touristy area. The service was friendly and we enojyed our visit.

reviews.title: Breakfast was free
reviews.text: Breakfast buffet was very good. A variety of items and breakfast drinks were available. Best of all, it's free.

reviews.title: FANTASTIC Fast food table service
reviews.text: This was a great place to eat on a day trip to the castle, if you forego the inside the castle tour bit.... Their food was great, the service magnificent and the drinks and cake were tops. We were seven people and sat outside on a sunny day. Couldn't believe how quich and good the food was, you don't often get both, this is one slick team of professionals.

reviews.title: Excellent food and ambiance
reviews.text: We enjoyed every meal we had here, breakfast, lunch and dinner. It was a relaxing way to get away from crowds and dine casually.

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.text: We had a fantastic meal for 10 in the restaurant. The preparation and service were outstanding. The venison was beyond compare. I would very highly recommend this restaurant and can't wait to come back
Service – 5 of 5, no nonsense fast service
reviews.title: Good place for lunch

reviews.text: Food – 4 of 5 authentic German cruisine, good taste and flavor
reviews.title: Great views, great service

reviews.text: Atmosphere – 3.5 of 5 can be noisy and chaotic when the tourists arrived in horde...
reviews.title: Great service and food

reviews.text: Price – 3.5 of 5 quite ok, main course EUR10 to 17, soup EUR6.50
reviews.title: Great restaurant

reviews.text: Location – At foothill of Neuschwanstein castle and Hohenschwangau castle, Greyline day
reviews.title: Great restaurant

reviews.text: We had a very nice hearty lunch. Delicious, and not need to wait longer.
reviews.title: Great food...fast service.
Very Good Restaurant
reviews.text: Although people come and go, they maintain the nice ambiance and pleasant looking staff.

reviews.title: Yummm!!!
reviews.text: We enjoyed very much our lunch.

reviews.title: Good food, very fast service
reviews.text: We had a very good lunch at this restaurant. The food was brought to us a few minutes after we ordered it. The food was tasty and we enjoyed the meal. Service was very good.

reviews.title: Best meal we had in Germany
reviews.text: We arrived late after traveling the Romantic Road. We had a delicious dinner. Then the next morning we had the best breakfast in Europe!! Every type of coffee served. Huge buffett. The best views of the castle with the sun coming up.
